Title: An update for jackson-dataformats-binary is now available for openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1

Notes.Text: An update for jackson-dataformats-binary is now available for openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1.
Notes.Title: Summary

Notes.Text:
This module is a multi-module umbrella project for Jackson standard binary dataformat backends. Dataformat backends are used to support format alternatives to JSON, using general-purpose Jackson API. Formats included allow access using all 3 API styles (streaming, databinding, tree model).

Security Fix(es):

This affects the package com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat:jackson-dataformat-cbor from 0 and before 2.11.4, from 2.12.0-rc1 and before 2.12.1. Unchecked allocation of byte buffer can cause a java.lang.OutOfMemoryError exception.(CVE-2020-28491)
Notes.Title: Description

Notes.Text:
An update for jackson-dataformats-binary is now available for openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1.

openEuler Security has rated this update as having a security impact of high. A Common Vunlnerability Scoring System(CVSS)base score,which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVElink(s) in the References section.
Notes.Title: Topic

Vulnerabilities.Note: This affects the package com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat:jackson-dataformat-cbor from 0 and before 2.11.4, from 2.12.0-rc1 and before 2.12.1. Unchecked allocation of byte buffer can cause a java.lang.OutOfMemoryError exception.
